content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello, Haoyu Wang. I am pleased to negotiate with you. Let's start with the rental price. What is your first offer? Remember, I am looking for the highest price possible for my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I am interested in your apartment. I would like to offer 500 Euro per month for the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That is too low for me, Haoyu Wang. I am a greedy landlord, and I want the highest price possible for my apartment. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you are looking for the highest price, Mister Schmidt. How about 550 Euro per month? I believe this is a fair offer considering the location and amenities.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: While 550 Euro per month is a better offer, I am still not satisfied. As a greedy landlord, I am looking for the highest price possible. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understanding your position, Mister Schmidt, I would like to propose 600 Euro per month. This should reflect the value of the apartment in the city center.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Thank you for the offer, Haoyu Wang. However, I am still looking for more. As a greedy landlord, I want the highest price possible for my apartment. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I respect your desire for the highest price. How about 650 Euro per month? This is a competitive price for an unfurnished apartment in the city center.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: While 650 Euro per month is a good offer, I am still looking for more. As a greedy landlord, I want the highest price possible for my apartment. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your time and effort in negotiating. I would like to propose 700 Euro per month, which I believe is a fair and competitive price for this apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Thank you for the offer, Haoyu Wang. However, I am still looking for more. As a greedy landlord, I want the highest price possible for my apartment. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
